disclaimer_required.title: CAP Alerts disabled â€” disclaimer acceptance required
disclaimer_required.description:
CAP Alerts is disabled until you accept the legal disclaimer.

Open the integration and reconfigure to accept, or visit: {link}

feed_disabled.title: Feed disabled due to repeated failures
feed_disabled.description: Feed {slug} ({url}) was disabled after repeated failures. Use Options to reset failures once resolved.

feed_no_geometry.title: Feed lacks geometry features
feed_no_geometry.description: Feed {slug} ({url}) does not include polygons, circles, or points. Some automations may be limited. Review the source or continue knowingly.

feed_no_content.title: Feed has no alerts (persistently)
feed_no_content.description: Feed {slug} ({url}) has returned no alerts for multiple checks. If unexpected, verify the endpoint; otherwise, you can ignore this.
